virophage.render

Class RenderTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • virophage.render.RenderTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class RenderTree
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A RenderTree contains an array of renderNodes, it is also a GUI componet.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Version:
    1.0 (Alpha)
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin and Leon Ren
